patthana11.7:1.1: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:2.1: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:3.1: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:4.1: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:5.1: Nakusalaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.7:6.1: Nakusalaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:7.1: Nakusalaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
patthana11.7:8.1: Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:9.1: Nakusalaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:10.1: Nakusalaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:11.1: Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
patthana11.7:12.1: Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana11.7:13.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
